alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Montgomery; Pike; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 3:40AM CDT until May 08 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in east central Missouri... Northeastern Montgomery County in east central Missouri... Central Warren County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 340 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Hartford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Warrenton, Wright City, Elsberry, Davis, Jonesburg, Truesdale, Hawk Point, Innsbrook, Eolia, Bellflower, High Hill, Silex, Truxton, Whiteside, Cave, Olney, Holstein, and New Hope. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 179 and 199. This also includes Cuivre River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
